attributes.action: Allow pupils to sell snacks and items of stationary in every school.
attributes.additional_details: If you find out about most entrepreneur Billionaires, they started out by selling items in school and other places, which I think is a skill that is important in life especially in finance which would tie in with the school curriculum. It would teach children how to sell, make profits, give shares, negotiation skills and saving money. This rule would help assist children when calculating math's equations and other skills throughout the curriculum in other subjects
attributes.background: Allow students to sell items in school or on school property by making a rule for every school. No selling Vapes, Drugs and other items like that, but items like sweets and snacks and school stationary to a certain extent.

rejection.details: Decisions about whether to permit students to sell goods on school property are a matter for individual schools, not the UK Government or Parliament.
